title: Pope's Historic Visit To The City Of Brotherly Love Spurs S
text:
PHILADELPHIA , Sept. 10, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --  Courtyard Philadelphia Airport invites guests to be a part of history during Pope Francis' 2015 visit to the United States on his World Meeting of Families tour. The pontiff is expected to make several appearances in Philadelphia on Sept. 26-27, 2015 , and travelers wishing to join in on the journey can take advantage of Courtyard Philadelphia Airport's SEPTA Train Package . Featuring deluxe accommodations plus two daily SEPTA round-trip train passes that can be used during the pope's visit, this special deal is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity with rates from just $289 to $499 a night. 
Traveling in and around Philadelphia will be limited to the SEPTA transit system during Francis' stay, so guests in town to attend Mass or even catch a glimpse will have an advantage when staying at the hotel on Bartram Avenue.
The pope will be leading Mass at the Cathedral Basilica of Saints Peter and Paul at 10:30 a.m. Sept. 26 , followed by a visit to Independence Mall at 4:45 p.m. and the Festival of Families at Benjamin Franklin Parkway at 7:30 p.m. On Sept. 27 , he will make a visit to the Curran-Fromhold Correctional Facility, followed by a Mass to conclude his visit at 4 p.m. at Benjamin Franklin Parkway.
The Courtyard is less than 15 miles from the hub of papal activity and about 2 miles from Philadelphia International Airport (PHL), making travel quick and convenient for out-of-town guests. A complimentary airport shuttle is available.
Following the pope's liturgy, visitors can return peacefully to modernly appointed accommodations at the Philadelphia airport hotel. Share the day's experience while utilizing the complimentary Wi-Fi, or relax on thick mattresses dressed with luxurious bedding and piles of fluffy pillows. Flat-panel TVs, flexible work desks with ergonomic chairs, mini refrigerators, coffee makers and spacious bathrooms are among the many additional amenities visitors will enjoy.
Before spurring a long day of worship or travel, head to The Bistro – Eat. Drink. Connect. From specialty Starbucks beverages to mouthwatering morning favorites like thick-cut French toast and classic oatmeal, the stylish eatery has everything guests need to get energized right on site. At night, The Bistro serves a variety of healthy and hearty dinner options, as well as a wide selection of evening cocktails. 
During downtime, visitors can work up a sweat in the hotel's state-of-the-art fitness center, boasting a variety of free weights and cardiovascular equipment with personal TV screens, or go for a refreshing dip in the indoor pool. 
To take advantage of the SEPTA Train Package, book reservations online or by calling 1-800-228-9290 and using promotional code CUE. 
About Courtyard Philadelphia Airport
Courtyard Philadelphia Airport at 8900 Bartram Ave. in Philadelphia, PA , is less than 2 miles from Philadelphia International Airport (PHL) and a short drive from Center City Philadelphia and downtown. The hotel boasts 4 floors, 140 rooms, 12 suites and 3 meeting rooms with 1,274 square feet of flexible event space. The Bistro – Eat. Drink. Connect., an indoor pool, fitness center, complimentary Wi-Fi and a shuttle service to the airport are among the many amenities visitors can enjoy. For information, visit www.CourtyardPhiladelphiaAirport.com or call 1-215-365-2200.
